__inputs.name: VAR_CITY_ID
__inputs.label: City used to get the weather

__inputs.name: VAR_LOCATION_LONGITUDE
__inputs.label: Longitude of the location of your solar panels

__inputs.name: VAR_LOCATION_LATITUDE
__inputs.label: Latitude of the location of your solar panels

targets.query:
from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: 1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldtotal")
  |> last()
  |> group( columns: [] )
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: 1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldtotal")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeDst: "agg_time")
  |> group(columns: [""])  
  |> drop(columns: [ "_start", "_stop", "agg_time"])

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: - 14d, stop: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldday")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1s)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field", "_measurement", "dtu"])

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: - 14d, stop: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldday")
  |> drop( columns: ["dtu"] )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> timeShift(duration: -2h, columns: ["_time"])   // Compensate the time shift introduced by aggregateWindow  
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeDst: "agg_time")
  |> group(columns: [""])  
  |> drop(columns: [ "_start", "_stop", "agg_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "total", _time: "Time"})

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today(), stop: -10s)  // Last time bucket may not have all values
  |> filter( fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "input_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
 |> group(columns: ["_time"])
 |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeDst: "agg_time")
 |> group(columns: [""])  
 |> drop(columns: [ "_start", "_stop", "agg_time"])

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> max()
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "channel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel_type"] == "AC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: [""])  
  |> drop(  columns: ["_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldday")
  |> last()
  |> group( columns: [] )
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldday")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
 |> group(columns: ["_time"])
 |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeDst: "agg_time")
 |> group(columns: [""])  
 |> drop(columns: [ "_start", "_stop", "agg_time"])

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> max()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldday")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: 1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldtotal")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: 1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldtotal")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "inverter"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeDst: "agg_time")
  |> group(columns: ["inverter"])  
  |> drop(columns: [ "_start", "_stop", "agg_time"])

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldday")
  |> last()
  |> group( columns: [] )
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output_per_dtu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "yieldday")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
 |> group(columns: ["_time"])
 |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeDst: "agg_time")
 |> group(columns: [""])  
 |> drop(columns: [ "_start", "_stop", "agg_time"])

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current"  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage" )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "output")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "input")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "testing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cloudiness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city_id"] == "$city_id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "*")  
  |> drop(columns: ["condition_id", "condition_main"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cloudiness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city"] == "Gröbenzell")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city_id"] == "2917221")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "*")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop( columns: ["condition_id", "condition","condition_main"])
  |> sort( columns:["_time"])
  |> group( columns:[])
  |> yield(name: "clouds")

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "channel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel_type"] == "AC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeDst: "agg_time")
  |> group(columns: [""])  
  |> drop(columns: [ "_start", "_stop", "agg_time"])
  |> rename( columns: {_value: "AC Total"})
  |> yield(name: "AC Total")

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: - 5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> drop( columns:["dtu", "_field"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sunrise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city_id"] == "${city_id}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000000 })) // Millisekunden
  |> last()

panels.description: Strom und Spannung der einzelnen Kanäle über die Zeit

targets.query:
from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "input")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current")
  |> drop(columns: ["dtu"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "solar/actual")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "input")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> drop(columns: ["dtu"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "input")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> drop( columns: ["dtu"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "input")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
